channel.title: Recitations on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Recitations on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Fixed‐Income Securities
item.description: Recitation slides on fixed-income securities, spot and forward rates, yield to maturity (YTM) and bond pricing, rate of return, bond arbitrage, duration, convexity, and immunization.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_rec01.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to compunding, discounting, APR, EAR, nominal vs real interest rate, growing annuity, perpetuity, auto loan, and project planning.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_rec03.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to DCF, PVGO, union pacific, and globex corporation.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_rec04.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to forwards vs futures, spot future parity, mark to market, and stock futures.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_rec05.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to elements of a call put option, pay off profile, binomial tree, pay off replication, and arboreal corporation.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_rec06.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to portfolio basics, efficient frontier, capital market line, diversification, and sharpe ratio.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_rec07.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to CAPM, beta, SML, alpha, the frontier, CML and SML.

item.title: MIT15_401F08_rec08.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information related to NPV, payback period, IRR, profitability index, and Bart’s super widget.

item.title: Recitations
item.description: Recitation slides are provided courtesy of course TA Yichuan Liu, and are used with permission. REC # TOPICS FILES 1 Present Value Relations (PDF) 2 Fixed-Income Securities (PDF) 3 Equities / Common Stocks (PDF) 4 Forward and Futures Contracts (PDF) 5 Options (PDF) 6 Portfolio Theory (PDF - 2.0MB) 7 Capital Asset Pricing Model (PDF) 8 Capital Budgeting (PDF)
